function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of consideration for COVID-19 precautionary requirements","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and potential outbreaks in fitness centers","Mitigation":"Integration of COVID-19 precautionary requirements into fitness center operations and design","Technologies":"Sanitization equipment, air filtration systems, contactless technology","People":"Members of fitness centers, staff and instructors","Owner":"Public and private fitness organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate maintenance, hygiene practices, and cleanliness of spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to unsanitary conditions","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict hygiene protocols, regular cleaning schedules, and hygiene training for staff","Technologies":"Cleaning and sanitization equipment, UV-C light sanitation systems","People":"Members of fitness centers, staff and instructors","Owner":"Public and private fitness organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of social distancing and interaction promotion in fitness center design","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and lack of community wellness support","Mitigation":"Incorporation of social distancing measures and design for promoting social interactions while maintaining safety","Technologies":"Space utilization software, contactless payment systems, virtual fitness classes","People":"Members of fitness centers, staff and instructors","Owner":"Public and private fitness organizations"}]}
